alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Fulton; Lagrange; Marshall; Noble; Northern Kosciusko; Pulaski; Southern Kosciusko; Starke; Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 9:05PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph late Friday night into Saturday morning. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart, Lagrange and Steuben Counties. In Michigan, Branch and Hillsdale Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst travel conditions from snow and blowing snow will be late Friday afternoon through Saturday morning. Rain will likely mix with snow for most of Friday which may limit impacts and accumulations during the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Elkhart; Fulton; Lagrange; Marshall; Noble; Northern Kosciusko; Pulaski; Southern Kosciusko; Starke; Steuben
